title: Report a catcall

info.p1: Submit your experience through this form. Important:
info.p2-bold: if you are in direct need of help
info.p5: Questions about reporting a catcall? Visit our FAQ and house rules

quote.title: Catcall quote*:
quote.help: Only Catcall text (what exactly has been catcalled)

context.title: Your story:
context.help: Additional information, not required. Moderators can edit this part of your report if necessary.

location.title: Location*:
location.help: Click on the map to add the location of the catcall.

checkbox.text: I account for this catcall report to be true and in accordance with the house rules.*

dialog: Your catcall has been reported. Thanks! You won't see it on the map yet. When a moderator has reviewed your submission it will be added to the map automatically.
